scripts.dev: yarn run clean:gtm && npx swc src/* --only **/*.js --out-dir gtm --config-file .dev.swcrc
scripts.dev:minify: yarn run clean:gtm && npx swc src/* --only **/*.js --out-dir gtm --config-file .build.swcrc
scripts.watch: yarn run clean:gtm && npx swc src/* --only **/*.js --out-dir gtm --config-file .dev.swcrc -w
scripts.watch:minify: yarn run clean:gtm && npx swc src/* --only **/*.js --out-dir gtm --config-file .build.swcrc -w
scripts.gtm: yarn run clean:gtm && npx swc src/* --only **/*.js --out-dir gtm --config-file .build.swcrc
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:build && yarn run clean:gtm
